00106 inline BDSAcceleratorComponent::

00108                         G4String& aName,G4double aLength, 
00109                         G4double aBpRadius,G4double aXAper,G4double aYAper, 
00110                         G4VisAttributes* aVisAtt,G4double angle  ):
